activities: Cherwell may use personal data of visitors to its websites to contact them about products or services for which they have expressed interest.  Cherwell may use personal data of customers to provide them with implementation services and/or technical support related to their use of Cherwell's software or to inform the customer about new software products and services or updates to existing products and services.  Depending on the nature of a visitor to Cherwell's websites request or the status as a customer, Cherwell may ask the visitor or customer to provide personal contact information including, but not limited to, name, email, phone number, location (country and state/province), company name, company country and city, business email, business phone number, and job title.  Cherwell may share personal data with contracted service providers.
